title: From mobile housing website
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317111637im_/http:/typophile.com/files/text_3881.gif)

The closest I found was Accord Alternate Medium, but the top of the lowercase h and the lowercase d, in my specimen, is slanted.

Thanks

Font: 

 Ubuntu (Medium Bold) 

Solved By: 

 [fvilanakis](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317111637/http:/typophile.com/user/176276 "View user profile.")
author: cosmorphis

comments.content: It must be **[Ubuntu (Medium Bold)](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317111637/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Google-Web-Fonts&ffam=Ubuntu%20-%20Medium%20Bold&fid=9d19e2a52e1c8f2b5ba6eb7d65587ead&fsize=60&text=Find%20Your%20Perfect%20Home%20Right%20Here.&wrap=2)** by Dalton Maag (now part of Google Web Fonts)
